plot outline: Meenakshi Kadhalan Elangovan is a story about two young lovers who live in an orthodox village. They do not have many things in life, except their love for each other. But there are people in their lives who are not happy with their love for each other. Will they be able to conquer all objections and live happily ever after?
title: Meenakshi Kadhalan Ilangovan
